message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I understand your concerns about the price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $165.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $155?
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I'll sell the product to you for $160.
I'm getting close to my limit, but I'm still not comfortable with $160. Would you be willing to go down to $155?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $162.50. This is my final offer.
I'm really close to walking away, but I'm still willing to make one more attempt. Would you be willing to meet me at $157.50?
I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers. I'll sell the product to you for $162.00.
I'm not willing to go any higher than $157.50. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to walk away and consider buying from John for $100.
